text: The 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 7 was a qualifying group for the 1990 FIFA World Cup. Czechoslovakia and Belgium were the two teams that qualified. ==Results== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Belgium 8 4 4 0 15 5 +10 12 Czechoslovakia 8 5 2 1 13 3 +10 12 Portugal 8 4 2 2 11 8 +3 10 Switzerland 8 2 1 5 10 14 –4 5 Luxembourg 8 0 1 7 3 22 –19 1 ==Top Scorers== === 7 goals === * Marc Van Der Linden === 5 goals === * Kubilay Türkyilmaz === 4 goals === * Michal Bílek * Tomáš Skuhravý * Rui Águas Category:1990 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA)
title: 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 7
